
```{r}

```

```{r}
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
toolik_biochem <- read_csv(here::here("data", "2011_Kling_Akchem.csv"), na = c(".", "NA"))
```

```{r}
View(toolik_biochem)
```

```{r}
toolik_biochem <- toolik_biochem |> clean_names()
```

```{r}
inlet_biochem <- toolik_biochem %>% dplyr::filter(site == "Toolik Inlet") %>% select(p_h, doc_u_m, tdn_u_m)
```
